metadata.titleEn: Data set of metallogenic regionalization of pegmatitic rare-metals in western Yunnan  (2019-2022)
metadata.titleCn: 滇西伟晶岩型稀有金属成矿带数据集（2019-2022）
metadata.description: 1) the western yunnan pegmatite type rare metal mineralization zoning into gaoligong mountains metallogenic belt, tengchong - lianghe metallogenic belt, cimo metallogenic belt, and phoenix city - lincang metallogenic belt and so on four metallogenic belt, metadata contains information ore belt is as follows: the main mineral rock, rock characteristics, the main mineral, rare metal mineralization mainly elements, diagenetic mineralization ages.Gaoligong mountains metallogenic belt rare metal pegmatite may cause for deep penetrating, its orebody mainly produce Yu Zhongshen metamorphic tectonic fissures, other three metallogenic belt rare metal pegmatite and its nearby granite has a close genetic relationship, its orebody mainly output within the granite rock body, inner and outer contact zone or away from the rock mass of the structure of the surrounding rock fracture.Mineralization age concentrated in the Himalayan period, the mineralization age concentrated in the Himalayan period, covers the paleocene, Eocene, Oligocene and Miocene four metallogenic period, its age range is mainly focused on the 62-15 ma.The age range as the main focus on 62-15 ma.2) data from the field "synthetical consolidation and rehabilitation field geological work and literature.3) data on high credibility, has practical application value.4) as the western yunnan pegmatite type rare metal ore provides the foundation, pointed out the direction.
metadata.descriptionCn: 1）将滇西伟晶岩型稀有金属成矿区划分为高黎贡山成矿带、腾冲—梁河成矿带、西盟成矿带和凤庆—临沧成矿带等四个成矿带，元数据包含矿带如下信息：主要岩石矿物，围岩特征，主要稀有金属矿物，主要矿化元素，成岩成矿年龄。高黎贡山成矿带稀有金属伟晶岩可能为深熔成因，其矿体主要产出于中深变质岩的构造裂隙中，其它三个成矿带稀有金属伟晶岩与其附近的花岗岩有密切的成因关系，其矿体主要产出于花岗岩体内部、内外接触带或远离岩体的围岩构造裂隙中。矿化时代集中于喜山期，矿化时代集中于喜山期，涵盖古新世、始新世、渐新世、中新世四个成矿时期，其年龄范围为主要集中于62-15Ma。其年龄范围为主要集中于62-15Ma。2）数据来自野外现场地质工作和文献综合整理。3）数据总体可信度高，具有实际应用价值。4）为滇西伟晶岩型稀有金属找矿提供了基础、指明了方向。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to gather information about the mineralization age and rock characteristics in rare metal pegmatite mineralization zones?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个数据收集方法的例子，用于收集关于稀有金属伟晶岩矿化带的矿化年龄和岩石特征的信息？
Example.AnswerEn: Data collection methods include field geological work and comprehensive literature review, focusing on the mineralization age and characteristics of major rock types and rare metal minerals within the pegmatite mineralization zones in western Yunnan.
Example.AnswerCn: 数据收集方法包括实地地质工作和全面的文献综述，重点关注西云南地区斑岩矿化带内主要岩石类型和稀有金属矿物的矿化年龄和特征。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the determination of mineralization ages ranging from 62-15Ma in the formation of rare metal pegmatite belts?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在稀有金属伟晶岩带的形成中，决定矿化年龄在62-15百万年之间的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The mineralization ages ranging from 62-15Ma are concentrated in the Himalayan period, covering Paleocene, Eocene, Oligocene, and Miocene epochs. This is due to the geological processes that occurred during these timeframes, which influenced the formation and mineralization in the pegmatite belts of western Yunnan.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 矿化年龄范围为62-15百万年，集中在喜马拉雅时期，涵盖了古新世、始新世、渐新世和中新世。这是由于在这些时间段内发生的地质过程影响了云南西部斑岩带的形成和矿化。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the objective of collecting and organizing data from the rare metal mineralization zones in the western Yunnan pegmatite field?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 收集和整理西云南伟晶岩区稀有金属矿化带数据的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The objective of collecting and organizing data from the rare metal mineralization zones in western Yunnan is to provide a foundational basis and guidance for exploring rare metal resources in pegmatite deposits. The data aims to delineate different metallogenic belts, characterize their geological features, and understand their mineralization processes, which can aid in efficient resource exploration and assessment.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 收集和整理云南西部稀有金属矿化带的数据，旨在为探讨斑岩矿床中的稀有金属资源提供基础依据和指导。该数据旨在划定不同的成矿带，表征其地质特征，并理解其矿化过程，这将有助于高效的资源勘探和评估。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedural methodologies are employed to collect and validate geological data for delineating rare metal mineralization zones in pegmatite regions?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在斑岩地区划定稀有金属矿化带时，采用哪些程序方法收集和验证地质数据？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Data collection involves field-based geological surveys and comprehensive literature reviews. The surveys are conducted to gather metadata on characteristics such as major rock minerals, surrounding rock features, and mineralization elements. The data is then validated through its application in guiding rare metal prospecting in Western Yunnan pegmatite-type mineralization zones.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 数据收集涉及基于实地的地质调查和全面的文献回顾。调查旨在收集关于主要岩石矿物、周围岩石特征和矿化元素等特征的元数据。然后通过在指导西云南伟晶岩型矿化区的稀有金属勘探中的应用来验证这些数据。
